post.body: u were to install for my mother 2day (order online & confirmed). No show, u say error in order & cancelled), poor service!
awesome! Great clip...does Colbert have a twitter?
thanks! no response so far....
great YouTube tips. Over my head but I've forwarded to others. See you tomorrow am.
Great preso! I echo Daniel's thoughts on the venn diagram. In this market especially, realtors (and all of us) need to get sma ...
starting a blog is like painting...when do you know you're finished and ready for viewing? I'm too picky.
Memory lane...just found a web site with animated clip art and synthesized Musak. How 90s...aren't there rules against this?
http://tinyurl.com/6kyq2w - Simple isn't better. Just moved to a simpler site design at school, great 4 prospects but 4 current families?
nervous...roll tide?!!?
SM impacts everything...photography for admission viewbk - no more lonely kid reading book under tree! http://tinyurl.com/5pxt5n
signed up for Backtype...how many folks find that site helpful...just exploring it myself.
Viral marketing work? Maybe/maybe not but it does catch your attention. Check out failed mascot auditions at http://tinyurl.com/6bbklz.
NEWS FLASH...I actually got a response from facebook support! They renamed the alumni page per my request! The gods must be smiling!
Hoping tomorrow has fewer fires and more time for long-term projects...well, we can only hope!
Got seven tabs open in Firefox and four programs running on my 5 year old laptop...too many projects, too litle time!
is it me or is linked in pretty buggy?
pleading with facebook to rename our school's page. Funny how users can't rename their own pages? Should I send them cookies?
Listening to Jason from Mozilla. A bug report is like Xmas present. What customer service!
Or..."It may take a bit longer if you're popular" (twitter)...junior high all over again!
Odd social media site alerts. Current faves: "something is technically wrong" (twitter) & "you have no friends" (facebook). Others?
